The Belly of an Architect

Ano: 1987

IMDb ID: tt0092637

Classificação: 6.9

Sinopse: An American architect arrives in Italy, supervising an exhibition for a French architect, Boullée, who is famous for his oval structures. Through the course of 9 months he becomes obsessed with his belly, suffers severe stomach pains, loses his wife, exhibition, his unborn child and finally his own life.—Ofir Zwebner
